title: Privacy Choices Dashboard
content:

- [I want to change my mobile number linked to my GCash account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9059222758041-I-want-to-change-my-mobile-number-linked-to-my-GCash-account)
- [My GCash account is on hold. How can I access my account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/18374080547609-My-GCash-account-is-on-hold-How-can-I-access-my-account)
- [I was Fully Verified, why was my GCash account downgraded to a basic account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31782046693529-I-was-Fully-Verified-why-was-my-GCash-account-downgraded-to-a-basic-account)

- [How do I claim my money from a suspended GCash Basic account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38827343196185-How-do-I-claim-my-money-from-a-suspended-GCash-Basic-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

At GCash, protecting your privacy is our top priority. We want to give you the tools and transparency to control your personal information.

The new Privacy Choices Dashboard lets you manage your data. With this feature, you can:

- Manage your GCash account info
- Access your GScore
- Update your email address
- Correct personal details
- View your transaction history
- Request GCredit statements
- Review the GCash Privacy Notice
- Choose what data you want to share for ad targeting

### **Where can I find the Privacy Choices Dashboard?**

To access the Privacy Choices Dashboard:

1. Go to your GCash homepage.
2. Tap **Profile**.
3. Tap **Privacy Choices**.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXeAQ7U2QUPThISNXQvc3o-B8QbMVPL5H53SnMzdKc14XdM3Y21fLsNN_o_JGRBsp6vccXSInplnXBlivU4nqqMo7mF00Pf72P_YZ48tbpQagm-UPGeiT9DR2VDt3H7B8vjMw-M9JA?key=qPR6W9CwhOEJ3fevMlp9ig)

**Note:**

Basic users will see the GCash Privacy Notice. To unlock the full Privacy Choices Dashboard, you need to be [Fully Verified.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393)

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393)
- [Is there a minimum maintaining balance required to use GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/37651205722777)
- [How to set up GCash account security questions](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38910564915865)
- [How to set up GCash Biometrics Login](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4413281262105)
- [Account Secure](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005597526)
